scenario_text.value:
I cannot stand that short temper of his, but
I am untroubled.

...I have never sought reward or compensation
for my efforts to protect him.

Even so, he has hurled a bevy of cruel words
our way since we exited the waterway.
There is no need for you to apologize.
I share culpability for this turn of events.
What do you mean by that?

...I could not disprove Minoru’s words
completely.
Oh, uh, yeah. Then I’ll go do just that.

(Falcomon obviously changed the subject. What
could he have meant?)

I feel a foreboding presence. Be careful if
you mean to search a different area.
